headline.main: The Road to a New Afghanistan

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''U.S. and 21 Other Nations Vow to Spend Billions on Afghanistan'' (news article, Nov. 21):
abstract: Letter by Joel R Charny of Refugees International says any rebuilding plan for Afghanistan should reflect experiences in other war-torn countries
snippet: To the Editor:    Re ''U.S. and 21 Other Nations Vow to Spend Billions on Afghanistan'' (news article, Nov. 21):...
